pkgmetadata.longdescription: Measurement of Biodiversity // Functions for calculating metrics for the measurement biodiversity and its changes across scales, treatments, and gradients. The methods implemented in this package are described in: Chase, J.M., et al. (2018) doi:10.1111/ele.13151, McGlinn, D.J., et al. (2019) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13102, McGlinn, D.J., et al. (2020) doi:10.1101/851717, and McGlinn, D.J., et al. (2023) doi:10.1101/2023.09.19.558467.
